product.title: Boys Drool Enamel Pin
product.description: Girls rule. This enamel pin is part of the Oxford Pennant Trouble Scouts collection where we teamed up with Keith Buckley, lead singer of Every Time I Die, super cool dad and certified Trouble Scout Sensei to create new gear for nice kids who are a little too bored (or tired, or sugared up) for their own good. This design is also available as an embroidered patch. Size: 1.5" tall Color: Black and red
product.descriptionHtml:
Girls rule. 

This enamel pin is part of the Oxford Pennant Trouble Scouts collection where we teamed up with Keith Buckley, lead singer of Every Time I Die, super cool dad and certified Trouble Scout Sensei to create new gear for nice kids who are a little too bored (or tired, or sugared up) for their own good.

This design is also available as an embroidered patch.

Size: 1.5" tall

Color: Black and red
